channel.title: Castle Wars
channel.description:
How do I make it so you don't lose items when you die in cwars.
Also how do I make them spawn back to the base instead of my normal spawn point

item.title: Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @shadowschool shadowschool
item.description:
@shadowschool wrote:

if(playerLevel[3] == 0) && (inclanwar = false) { ApplyDead(); pEmote = 2304; actionTimer = 3; teleportToX = 3093; teleportToY = 3491; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } /*else if ((inclanwar == true) && (clan == 1)) { ApplyDead2(); teleportToX = 2899; teleportToY = 3557; } else if ((inclanwar == true) && (clan == 2)) { ApplyDead2(); teleportToX = 3093; teleportToY = 3491; }*/ } }

Something like this, keep in mind this is just abstract and the variables, and Co ords, may be different for your intended use.
